title: GitHub Actions Repository Access Issue
details:
GitHub Actions builds are actually working now! Recent runs show:
- 2025-06-11T17:51:27Z: SUCCESS 
- 2025-06-11T17:40:37Z: SUCCESS
- Earlier runs: Some failures

The issue with "1.0.0-beta" version persisting is likely because:
1. The successful builds still contain development versions (built before versioning fixes)
2. The builds may be using development configuration
3. Need to verify the CI workflow is actually applying dynamic versioning

The "Repository not found" issue appears to be resolved, builds are completing successfully.
